item.description:
SURPRISE birthday party for Amy (Alan's girlfriend) at Tokyo on Aug 18! This does NOT replace the regular meetup (Aug 11), but is in addition to it.

Many of you may know Amy and Alan as regular attendees at the sushi meetups, but they have not had Internet access and therefore have not been participating via e-mail and the web. (That's how I'm getting away with announcing a surprise party!)

Guests should be expected to arrive by 7:30pm, while Amy is expected to arrive with Alan around 8:00pm. The entire tatami room (floor space) has been reserved for this event, so plan on removing your shoes and dining traditional Japanese style.

group.name: The Rhode Island Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Special event: Sushi SURPRISE Birthday Party
